entry.title: Combined summary - [ANNOUNCE] BitCoinJ 0.5 released
entry.summary: BitCoinJ 0.5 has been released with a focus on bug fixes, completion of transition to the protobuf wallet format and standardization of build. The release includes a native API preview which allows users to access bitcoinj from C++/Objective-C++. A Google+ page for announcements and developer tips/ideas has also been created. New features in the release include Address.getParameters(), Address.getParametersFromAddress(), updated bouncy castle version, faster transactions receiving, update to testnet2 rules, auto-migration of wallets to protobuf format, standard Maven directory layout and many bug fixes. The contributors have been thanked for their work on this release. The library can be downloaded from www.bitcoinj.org.
